title: Smart Classroom-Based Nursing Simulation Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Basic Nursing Theories and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Customized corporate training course strengthening virtual simulation training with emphasis on workplace applicability.

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic nursing skills (medication administration, vital sign measurement, etc.) with over 85% accuracy in virtual simulation environments
Learners can demonstrate peer feedback-based problem-solving skills with over 90% participation using smart classroom tools
Learners can develop nursing care plans applicable to real clinical scenarios through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
